text: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِى عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ

translation.en.sahih: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion.
translation.id.indonesian: Atau siapakah dia yang memberi kamu rezeki jika Allah menahan rezeki-Nya? Sebenarnya mereka terus menerus dalam kesombongan dan menjauhkan diri?
